{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NEC |model=WG1400 |revision=HP |asin=B00C2FID14;JP; |price=142 |est_release_date=03/28/2013 |is_manuf=No |availability=Japan only |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9880 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=aterm-XXXXXX-g,aterm-XXXXXX-a |default_ssid_regex=^aterm-[A-Fa-f0-9]{6}-g$,,,^aterm-[A-Fa-f0-9]{6}-a$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 }} [http://121ware.com/product/atermstation/product/warpstar/wg1400hp/ Product page (JP)] • [http://121ware.com/product/atermstation/websupport/wg1400hp/top.html Support page (JP)] • [http://121ware.com/product/atermstation/manual/wg1800hp/wg1800hp_manual_basic.pdf Manual (JP)]
Per ''[[NEC]]''s manual... *The device appears to have a default IP of 192.168.10.1 in Router mode. *The default SSID formats appear to be '''aterm-XXXXXX-g''' and '''aterm-XXXXXX-a''', :where '''XXXXXX''' may be related to a MAC address used by the unit :(upper / lower case letters? ) or something completely different. I dunno :*Guest network SSIDs seem to be '''aterm-XXXXXX-gx''' and '''aterm-XXXXXX-ax''' :*WEP only SSID (2.4GHz only) is '''aterm-XXXXXX-gw'''
*[http://www.amazon.co.jp/NEC-%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E9%9B%BB%E6%B0%97-AtermWG1400HP-PA-WG1400HP/dp/B00C2FID14 On Amazon.co.jp] • ASIN: B00C2FID14, Listed on: 2013-03-28, :Price as of 2013-04-21: ￥ 14,100 (~$141.65 USD)
